name: P-Guard
mission: Security patrols.
Intrusions and/or anomalies detection via AI.
Doubt removals with video verification and remote interpellation.
On-demand intervention.
« Click and Go » function.
Real-time remote control of the robot with anti-collision safety.
hardware: 360° camera for object segmentation and remote monitoring
4 wheels actuators with encoders for differential-drive motion

name: S-Drone
mission: Underwater exploration/inspection drone.
Automated scanning of cargo hull and analysis report generation via AI.
Pipe exploration and leakage detection.
Seabed scanning and object retrieval.
Position fixing (altitude, distance...) via numerical controllers.
Real-time video feedback and remote control in every direction.

name: S-Navigator
mission: Surface Wi-Fi relay.
Combines the GPS absolute position and acoustic relative position to locate the underwater robot down to cm-level precision.
Automated bathymetric survey with complete coverage path-planning algorithms.
« Click and Go » function.
Real-time remote control via vector-state feedback controllers.
hardware: 3 propellers for 3 degrees of freedom and holonomic motion

name: UR5e
mission: Industrial, collaborative robot.
Used for research on cooking robots and soft manipulation.
A camera segments vegetables on the cutting plane, the first arm picks it up and holds it, and the second cuts it.
The motion of the knife is handled by a Q-Learning Policy trained to minimize the force/torque exerted on it.
hardware: Coupled with virtual twins for reinforcement learning processes

name: B1A
mission: Autonomous cleaning of land-based solar panels to maximize the energy production.
Executes a succession of maneuvers to accomplish a cleaning mission ordered by the operator via the web interface.
Segmentation of the panels shapes and positions with the LiDARs and RANSAC models.
Bringing down the brush and self-regulating cleaning pressure to optimize the cleaning.
hardware: 3D LiDARs for panel segmentation and obstacle avoidance
6 wheels actuators with encoders for holonomic motion
Sonars, winches encoders and limit switches for brush regulation

name: F1T
mission: Autonomous cleaning of floating solar panels to maximize the energy production.
Developed under the scope of the Horizon Europe project 'Talos'.
Switching behavior automatically depending on the conditions of the photovoltaic plant to clean when / where needed.
Segmentation of the panels' centroid with the depth cameras and custom YOLO model.
hardware: Framos depth cameras for panel segmentation and obstacle avoidance
2 tracked wheel actuators for differential-drive motion
